content: --कल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} speaking softly or inarticulately, speaking indistinctly; <ls>R. 9. 37.</ls> {2} uttering low sounds of love. {3} drunk with passion; <ls>U. 1. 31</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 14.</ls> {4} indistinct yet sweet; मदकलं कूजितं सारसानां <ls>Me. 31.</ls> {5} ruttish, furious, under the influence of rut; <ls>V. 4. 24.</ls> {6} furious, mad. (--लः an elephant in rut.
